name: Falling ground
description:
It's a platformer. Arrows (or WASD) to move, X (or L) to jump.
Also there is boss. In boss fight you can speed up your fall by pressing "down".

In case you're lost, try to get as far right as you can.

NOTE: If you're experiencing performance issues, try switching to fullscreen mode (via alt+enter).

Made for Ludum Dare 38.
